Description: Available for an immediate move-in, or for September 1st! Top floor one bedroom, one bathroom with a small attached office in South Boston's City Point. Located on a a quiet, one way street, this third floor unit has hardwood floors throughout, exposed brick, an open main living area, and laundry in the basement. Gas and electric are separate bills. Kitchen equipped with dishwasher, gas range, and large refrigerator. Some extra storage in basement. For showings, inquire directly through Zillow
